event.description: Marco Scutaro doubles (5) on a fly ball to left fielder Matt Holliday.
Aaron Hill flies out to left fielder Matt Holliday. Marco Scutaro to 3rd.
Alex Rios grounds out, shortstop Orlando Cabrera to first baseman Jason Giambi.
Vernon Wells pops out to second baseman Bobby Crosby.
Adam Lind called out on strikes.
Scott Rolen doubles (6) on a line drive to center fielder Ryan Sweeney.
Kevin Millar singles on a line drive to center fielder Ryan Sweeney. Scott Rolen scores.
Rod Barajas homers (3) on a fly ball to left field. Kevin Millar scores.
Jose Bautista called out on strikes.
Marco Scutaro walks.
Aaron Hill grounds into a force out, third baseman Jack Hannahan to second baseman Bobby Crosby. Marco Scutaro out at 2nd.
Alex Rios strikes out swinging.
Vernon Wells singles on a ground ball to left fielder Matt Holliday.
Adam Lind called out on strikes.
Scott Rolen grounds out, shortstop Orlando Cabrera to first baseman Jason Giambi.
Kevin Millar flies out to center fielder Ryan Sweeney.
Rod Barajas flies out to right fielder Travis Buck.
Jose Bautista walks.
Marco Scutaro reaches on a force attempt, missed catch error by second baseman Bobby Crosby, assist to third baseman Jack Hannahan. Jose Bautista to 2nd.
Aaron Hill strikes out swinging.
Alex Rios walks.
Vernon Wells flies out to left fielder Matt Holliday.
Adam Lind singles on a line drive to center fielder Ryan Sweeney. Alex Rios to 2nd.
Pitching Change: Michael Wuertz replaces Josh Outman.
Scott Rolen flies out to right fielder Travis Buck in foul territory. Alex Rios to 3rd.
Kevin Millar grounds into a force out, shortstop Orlando Cabrera to second baseman Bobby Crosby. Adam Lind out at 2nd.
Rod Barajas grounds out, third baseman Jack Hannahan to first baseman Jason Giambi.
Jose Bautista pops out to first baseman Jason Giambi in foul territory.
Marco Scutaro strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Russ Springer replaces Michael Wuertz.
Aaron Hill singles on a line drive to left fielder Matt Holliday.
Alex Rios singles on a soft fly ball to center fielder Ryan Sweeney. Aaron Hill to 2nd.
Vernon Wells flies out to left fielder Matt Holliday.
Adam Lind reaches on a force attempt, fielding error by shortstop Orlando Cabrera. Aaron Hill to 3rd. Alex Rios to 2nd.
Scott Rolen strikes out swinging.
Kevin Millar grounds out, third baseman Jack Hannahan to first baseman Jason Giambi.
Pitching Change: Andrew Bailey replaces Russ Springer.
Rod Barajas flies out to right fielder Travis Buck.
Jose Bautista grounds out, shortstop Orlando Cabrera to first baseman Jason Giambi.
Marco Scutaro strikes out swinging.
Defensive Substitution: Gregorio Petit replaces first baseman Jason Giambi, batting 3rd, playing second base.
Defensive switch from second base to first base for Bobby Crosby.
Aaron Hill grounds out, third baseman Jack Hannahan to first baseman Bobby Crosby.
Alex Rios strikes out swinging.
Vernon Wells grounds out, second baseman Gregorio Petit to first baseman Bobby Crosby.
Orlando Cabrera strikes out swinging, catcher Rod Barajas to first baseman Kevin Millar.
Kurt Suzuki grounds out, shortstop Marco Scutaro to first baseman Kevin Millar.
Jason Giambi flies out to center fielder Vernon Wells.
Matt Holliday singles on a ground ball to left fielder Jose Bautista.
With Jack Cust batting, wild pitch by Scott Richmond, Matt Holliday to 2nd.
Jack Cust flies out to center fielder Vernon Wells. Matt Holliday to 3rd.
Ryan Sweeney homers (2) on a fly ball to right field. Matt Holliday scores.
Bobby Crosby grounds out, shortstop Marco Scutaro to first baseman Kevin Millar.
Travis Buck singles on a line drive to left fielder Jose Bautista.
Jack Hannahan doubles (2) on a line drive to right fielder Alex Rios. Travis Buck scores.
Orlando Cabrera singles on a ground ball to center fielder Vernon Wells. Jack Hannahan scores. Orlando Cabrera to 2nd on the throw.
Kurt Suzuki doubles (10) on a ground ball to left fielder Jose Bautista. Orlando Cabrera scores.
Jason Giambi walks.
Matt Holliday pops out to second baseman Aaron Hill.
Jack Cust flies out to center fielder Vernon Wells.
Ryan Sweeney flies out to center fielder Vernon Wells.
Bobby Crosby flies out to left fielder Jose Bautista.
Travis Buck lines out to shortstop Marco Scutaro.
Jack Hannahan strikes out swinging.
Orlando Cabrera lines out to center fielder Vernon Wells.
Kurt Suzuki pops out to first baseman Kevin Millar.
Jason Giambi flies out to left fielder Jose Bautista.
Matt Holliday strikes out swinging.
Jack Cust walks.
Ryan Sweeney flies out to left fielder Jose Bautista.
Bobby Crosby grounds into a double play, shortstop Marco Scutaro to second baseman Aaron Hill to first baseman Kevin Millar. Jack Cust out at 2nd.
Travis Buck singles on a line drive to center fielder Vernon Wells.
Jack Hannahan out on a sacrifice bunt, pitcher Scott Richmond to second baseman Aaron Hill. Travis Buck to 2nd.
Orlando Cabrera flies out to right fielder Alex Rios.
Kurt Suzuki lines out to left fielder Jose Bautista.
Jason Giambi flies out to left fielder Jose Bautista.
Matt Holliday grounds out, third baseman Scott Rolen to first baseman Kevin Millar.
Jack Cust grounds out, first baseman Kevin Millar to pitcher Scott Richmond.
